mapper.select: SELECT idx, name, link FROM NARO_NEWS_CATEGORY WHERE lvl=1 AND del_yn='N' AND is_open = 'Y' ORDER BY sort_order;
SELECT idx, name, link FROM NARO_NEWS_CATEGORY WHERE lvl=2 AND parent_idx=#{parentIdx} AND del_yn='N' AND is_open='Y' ORDER BY sort_order;
SELECT idx, name FROM NARO_NEWS_CATEGORY WHERE del_yn='N' AND ifnull(link,'')='' AND lvl=2 ORDER BY name;
SELECT (CASE WHEN lvl=1 THEN idx ELSE parent_idx END) as idx, name FROM NARO_NEWS_CATEGORY WHERE idx=( SELECT category_idx FROM NARO_NEWS WHERE idx=#{newsIdx} );
SELECT (CASE WHEN lvl=1 THEN idx ELSE parent_idx END) as cate_idx, name FROM NARO_NEWS_CATEGORY WHERE idx=#{categoryIdx};

SELECT a.*, b.idx, b.parent_idx FROM naro_news a inner join ( select * from naro_news_category where parent_idx in ( select idx from naro_news_category where is_open ='Y' and del_yn ='N' and lvl = 1 ) and del_yn ='N' and is_open = 'Y' ) b on a.category_idx = b.idx where a.open_yn ='Y' and a.del_yn = 'N' order by a.write_date desc limit 8
